name: James
testimony: “Volunteering at CIDI was one of the best experiences of my life. I have always loved working with children and families and CIDI gave me the opportunity of volunteering in their school  of underprivileged children Star Pre Primary school in teaching children Art and Crafts.”

name: Joseph
testimony: “I can honestly say that volunteering at CIDI and working at the Miswe project has changed the way I view agriculture. Working at the project ignited the fire I had for fitting against the Climate change crisis, it is also very satisfying to know that you are helping people get economic independence.”

name: Rodrigus
testimony: “When I think that there people in the world that do not have access to clean water, it breaks my heart, that is why I volunteered at CIDI with their wash program, through it I got to see peoples smiles as they now can have access to clean water, hence improve there day and life forever”
